sentences.sContent: The poor weather was partly responsible for the crash.
sentences.sCn: 天气不好是造成坠机事故的部分原因。

sentences.sContent: The company’s problems are partly due to bad management.
sentences.sCn: 那家公司的问题部分是由于管理不善造成的。

sentences.sContent: It is partly because of her sick mother that she hasn’t taken the job abroad.
sentences.sCn: 她没有接受那份去国外的工作，部分原因是母亲病了。

sentences.sContent: The group is funded partly by the government.
sentences.sCn: 那个团体的部分资金由政府提供。

sentences.sContent: ...when the most recent oil price shock has been partly responsible for kicking off the great recession...
...I had come to the developers' conference partly because I hoped that this particular set of parents...
...That was partly due to his talents: showmanship...

words.tran: 局部的；偏爱的；不公平的
划分，分开；[数] 分割；隔墙；隔离物
分开（part的过去式及过去分词）
划分（partition的过去分词）；分割；把…分成部分

trans.tranOther: to some degree, but not completely
